additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Aqua, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Dimethicone, VP/Methacrylamide/Vinyl Imidazole Copolymer, Carbomer, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Disodium EDTA, Lactic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Trideceth-5, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, DMDM Hydantoin, Phenoxyethanol, Phenylpropanol, Propanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Caution: Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes.
